#Text=Be a Beatles Fan
#Text=Do you like The Beatles , but you 're not really a true fan ?
#Text=The Beatles are still popular today , and have been for years !
#Text=Be a fan with article , and you 'll be a fan in no time !
#Text=Steps
#Text=Buy all the music you can find on online stores and at Target .
#Text=You are bound to find their music under " Classic Rock . "
#Text=" Sgt. Pepper 's Lonely Hearts Club Band " is really popular , as is " Strawberry Fields Forever " and " Rubber Soul " , but almost all their music is a must have if you want to be a true fan .

column1: #Text=Buy various T-shirts .
#Text=T-shirts are essential when you 're a Beatles fan .
#Text=You can find all sorts of T-shirts of The Beatles on Amazon or eBay .
#Text=Try to buy brand new ones .
#Text=Buy some memorabilia .
#Text=You can find all your Beatles stuff on eBay and Amazon .
#Text=Memorabilia is also a good thing to have when you 're a true fan of something .
#Text=Have/make some posters .
#Text=Posters of The Beatles can be found in a lot places .
#Text=Try to get one with all four of them in the picture .
#Text=Listen to their music all the time .
#Text=Do n't play it aloud late at night when people are sleeping , though .
#Text=Then you 'll just be a nuisance .
#Text=Wear your T-shirts all the time and let people see your memorabilia !
#Text=Study up on the history of the Fab Four .
#Text=Read biographies and autobiographies , watch documentaries ( the Beatles anthology videos are very good ) , films the four starred in like , " A Hard Day 's Night " and " Help ! "

column1: #Text=Study Lennon 's artwork .
#Text=Anything that will help you connect and feel closer to the Four Lads from Liverpool !
#Text=Listen to the solo work .

#Text=If you learn a bit about John and his Plastic Ono Band , Paul McCartney and Wings , George Harrison and his Traveling Wilburys , and Ringo and his All Starr Band , you 'll begin to recognize each member as an individual person , and not just as one whole group known as The Beatles .
#Text=You 'll grow familiar with their music styles , the things they sing about , and the way each man was .
#Text=Learn the meaning behind each song .
#Text=It helps you learn about their lives , families , and interests .
#Text=You 'll begin to feel close and you may even be able to relate to each member !
#Text=It adds a bit of a story and even more meaning to the songs they had written .
#Text=Tips
#Text=Wearing your T-shirts will help people to realize you love The Beatles .
#Text=Knowing about The Beatles ' backstory is all about being a fan of them .
#Text=If you want to listen to the Beatles in a really nostalgic and traditional way , listen to them on vinyl .
#Text=However , this may be difficult as many original copies of Beatles ' albums are worth a fortune nowadays .
#Text=Things You 'll Need
#Text=Memorabilia
#Text=Posters
#Text=T-Shirts
#Text=Beatles music
#Text=Biographies
#Text=Documentaries
